trans-unit.source: "Every spell has the potential to be worthless."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「每个咒语都有无用的一刻。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Fog Elemental
trans-unit.target: 雾元素

trans-unit.resname: WTH·40 | Fog Elemental | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·40 | Fog Elemental | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, bury it at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 若雾元素攻击或阻挡，则在战斗结束时将牠埋葬。

trans-unit.source: "I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me."\n—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「我的确看过浓到砍得开的雾，不过那些雾都不会砍伤我。」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.source: Mana Chains
trans-unit.target: 魔法力锁链

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains "Cumulative upkeep o1."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得「累积维持o1」。

trans-unit.source: "The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part."\n—Sisay, journal
trans-unit.target: 「荒野之王非得被毁灭不可；而我和此事间被命运的锁链相连著。但愿杰拉尔德也能看到他扮演的角色。」 ～西赛的日志

trans-unit.source: Manta Ray
trans-unit.target: 幅𫚉

trans-unit.resname: WTH·42 | Manta Ray | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Islandhome (If defending player controls no islands, this creature cannot attack. If you control no islands, bury this creature.)
trans-unit.target: 潜居海岛（若防御玩家未操控海岛，则此生物不可攻击。若你未操控海岛，则埋葬此生物。）

trans-unit.resname: WTH·42 | Manta Ray | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Manta Ray cannot be blocked except by blue creatures.
trans-unit.target: 幅𫚉不可被蓝色生物以外的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Traders
trans-unit.target: 人鱼队商

trans-unit.source: When Merfolk Traders comes into play, draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 当人鱼队商进场时，抽一张牌，然后选择弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "As much as I hate water, I *do* love fish . . . ."\n—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「虽然我讨厌水，但我真的很爱鱼…」 ～晴空号的米丽

trans-unit.source: Noble Benefactor
trans-unit.target: 尊贵的捐助人

trans-unit.source: If Noble Benefactor is put into any graveyard from play, each player may search his or her library for any one card and put that card into his or her hand. Each player who searches his or her library shuffles it afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 若尊贵的捐助人自场中被放置入任何坟墓场，每位玩家都可以由他自己的牌库中搜寻任何一张牌，并且将该牌放置在他自己的手中。此后，每位由牌库中搜寻牌的玩家将他自己的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Ophidian
trans-unit.target: 欧菲迪安蛇

trans-unit.source: o0: Draw a card. Ophidian deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Ophidian is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: o0：抽一张牌。欧菲迪安蛇此回合中不造成战斗伤害。你只能在欧菲迪安蛇攻击且未被阻挡时使用此异能，且每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.source: Paradigm Shift
trans-unit.target: 典范转移

trans-unit.source: Remove all cards in your library from the game. Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: 将你的牌库中的所有牌移出游戏。然后将你的坟墓场中的所有牌洗牌，以成为你的牌库。

trans-unit.source: "Barrin always said that reality is relative. 'The world,' he cautioned, 'is but pieces of one's perception.'"\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「巴林常说真实是相对的。『所谓的世界，』他曾警示道，『不过是个人知觉的片段罢了。』」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Pendrell Mists
trans-unit.target: 潘卓欧迷雾

trans-unit.source: Each creature gains "During your upkeep, pay o1 or bury this creature."
trans-unit.target: 每只生物获得「在你的维持阶段，支付o1，否则埋葬此生物」。

trans-unit.source: As insubstantial—and as insistent—as appetite.
trans-unit.target: 同食欲一般虚无～但也一样醒目。

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士不可被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Fishtails infest the water, and mists walk the land. Give me simple solid rock any day."\n—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「鱼尾在水中出没，雾在地上爬行。而我呢，只期望著一块坚实的土地。」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.source: Phantom Wings
trans-unit.target: 幽魅羽翼

trans-unit.resname: WTH·49 | Phantom Wings | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·49 | Phantom Wings | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲幽魅羽翼：将受此结界的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "But you *said* 'when goats fly!'" Squee whined.
trans-unit.target: 斯奎哀号著说：「但是你说『如果羊会飞』啊！」

trans-unit.source: Psychic Vortex
trans-unit.target: 精神漩涡

trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep— Draw a card At the end of each of your turns, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.
trans-unit.target: 累积维持～抽一张牌 在你的每一个回合结束时，牺牲一张地，并且弃掉你的所有手牌。

trans-unit.source: "Tolaria floats upon a wheel of fortune."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「陶拉里亚在命运之轮上沈浮著。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Relearn
trans-unit.target: 重新学习

trans-unit.source: Return target instant, interrupt, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标瞬间、干涉或巫术牌由你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: "Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「巴林曾告诉我最难理解的学问，就是那些你学过的东西。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Sage Owl
trans-unit.target: 睿智的猫头鹰

trans-unit.resname: WTH·52 | Sage Owl | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·52 | Sage Owl | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library and put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当睿智的猫头鹰进场时，检视你的牌库顶的四张牌，然后以任意顺序将它们放回。

trans-unit.source: The owl asks but never answers.
trans-unit.target: 猫头鹰总是问而不答。

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Veil
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力之幔

trans-unit.source: Whenever any creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你所操控的生物攻击，则该生物在战斗结束时跃离。

trans-unit.source: "I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?"\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「不是我要说旅法师们的坏话…但是泰菲力真的知道自己在干嘛吗？」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Timid Drake
trans-unit.target: 怯懦的龙兽

trans-unit.resname: WTH·54 | Timid Drake | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·54 | Timid Drake | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If any other creature comes into play, return Timid Drake to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 若有任何其他生物进场，则将怯懦的龙兽移回拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "I sneezed, and it bolted."\n—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「我打个喷嚏，牠就被吓跑了。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Drake
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying, phasing
trans-unit.target: 飞行，时间跳跃

trans-unit.source: Many have been lost just in staring at its wings. What's seen differs from account to account, but madness is always part of the story.
trans-unit.target: 许多人看到牠的翼就迷失了自我。有关于看到的是什么，多半因人而异，但疯狂总占了故事的一部份。

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Entrancer
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚迷幻术士

trans-unit.source: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer is blocked by any creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 一旦陶拉里亚迷幻术士被任何生物阻挡，则在战斗结束时获得该生物的操控权。

trans-unit.source: "Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me—and with music."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「我干嘛吹嘘？吟游诗人们自然会为我代劳～而且还有音乐伴奏。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Serpent
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚大蛇

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，将你的牌库顶上七张牌放置于坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "When the fishtails' threats of magic didn't move me, they set their pet on us."\n—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「当鱼尾的魔法拿我没辄时，牠们只得拿出宠物来对付我们。」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.source: Vodalian Illusionist
trans-unit.target: 伏特里亚幻术师

trans-unit.source: o Uo U, oc T: Target creature phases out.
trans-unit.target: oUoU，ocT：目标生物跃离。

trans-unit.source: "Torahn gore these shifty fishtails! You can't even get close to one."\n—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「愿托朗撞死那些鱼尾！你连靠近其中一只都办不到。」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.source: Abyssal Gatekeeper
trans-unit.target: 深渊守门者

trans-unit.source: If Abyssal Gatekeeper is put into any graveyard from play, each player chooses and buries a creature he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果深渊守门者从场上被放到任何坟墓场中，每个玩家选择并埋葬他所操控的一只生物。

trans-unit.source: "There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."\n—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「有两种方法可让我通过这道门。其中一种可以保持你意识清醒。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Agonizing Memories
trans-unit.target: 惨痛的回忆

trans-unit.source: Look at target player's hand. Choose two of those cards and put them on top of his or her library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 查看目标对手的手牌，选择其中两张，并将它们以任意顺序放到他的牌库顶端。

trans-unit.source: "An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「一个无辜的人竟因我的愤怒而死，这件事将永远侵扰著我。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Barrow Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 土冢食尸鬼

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game or bury Barrow Ghoul.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，将你坟墓场顶上起第一张生物牌移出游戏，否则埋葬土冢食尸鬼。

trans-unit.source: "They killed my family to deny me a future. They fed on my ancestors to deny me a past."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「他们杀了我的家人以抹消我的未来，他们啃噬我的祖先以抹消我的过去。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Bone Dancer
trans-unit.target: 白骨舞者

trans-unit.source: o0: Put the top creature card of defending player's graveyard into play under your control. Bone Dancer deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Bone Dancer is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: o0：将防御玩家的坟墓场顶上起第一张生物牌放置进场，并由你所操控。白骨舞者本回合不造成战斗伤害。你只能在白骨舞者攻击且未被阻挡时使用此异能，且每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.source: Buried Alive
trans-unit.target: 活埋

trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Shuffle your library afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中最多搜寻三张生物牌，并将它们放置于你的坟墓场中，之后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Is it worse to walk while dead, or to be buried alive? I have witnessed both."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「死而不僵与活而被埋，那个比较悲惨？我两者都见识过。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Circling Vultures
trans-unit.target: 盘旋的秃鹰

trans-unit.resname: WTH·64 | Circling Vultures | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·64 | Circling Vultures | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game or bury Circling Vultures.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，将你坟墓场顶上起第一张生物牌移出游戏，否则埋葬盘旋秃鹰。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·64 | Circling Vultures | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If Circling Vultures is in your hand, you may discard it. Play this ability as an instant.
trans-unit.target: 如果盘旋秃鹰在你手上，你可以弃掉它。将此异能视为瞬间使用。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·65 | Coils of the Medusa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coils of the Medusa
trans-unit.target: 梅杜莎发卷

trans-unit.resname: WTH·65 | Coils of the Medusa | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界生物得+1/-1。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·65 | Coils of the Medusa | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲梅杜莎发卷：消灭所有阻挡受此结界生物的非墙生物。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·65 | Coils of the Medusa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Serpentine locks shape ornate rocks.
trans-unit.target: 蟒蛇之发塑造出华丽的石块。

trans-unit.source: Doomsday
trans-unit.target: 末日

trans-unit.source: Pay half your life, rounded up: Put your graveyard on top of your library, then remove all but five cards of your library from the game. Put the rest on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 支付一半生命，小数点以下进位：将你的坟墓场放置于你的牌库顶上。然后将你的牌库移出游戏，但留下五张牌。然后将剩下的牌以任意顺序放置于你的牌库顶部。

trans-unit.source: Fatal Blow
trans-unit.target: 致命一击

trans-unit.source: Bury target creature that was damaged this turn.
trans-unit.target: 埋葬目标在本回合受伤害的生物。

trans-unit.source: "What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?"\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「让心上的伤淌血，或把心整个挖出来，何者较残酷？」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Festering Evil
trans-unit.target: 邪恶溃伤

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and player. o Bo B, Sacrifice Festering Evil: Festering Evil deals 3 damage to each creature and player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，邪恶溃伤对每个生物和玩家造成1点伤害。 oBoB，牺牲邪恶溃伤：邪恶溃伤对每个生物和玩家造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Fledgling Djinn
trans-unit.target: 幼年巨灵

trans-unit.resname: WTH·69 | Fledgling Djinn | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·69 | Fledgling Djinn | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，幼年巨灵对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「年轻的一辈往往很危险。相信我，我很清楚。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Gallowbraid
trans-unit.target: 加洛布雷得

trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep—1 life
trans-unit.target: 累积维持～1点生命

trans-unit.source: "If its skin looks like stone, it is only to match its heart."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「即使他的皮肤看起来像铁石，也硬不过他的心肠。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Haunting Misery
trans-unit.target: 悲苦萦绕

trans-unit.source: Remove X creature cards in your graveyard from the game: Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player.
trans-unit.target: 将你的坟墓场中X张生物牌移出游戏：悲苦缠绕对目标玩家造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "I am condemned without end."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「我的生命已注定没有终点了。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Hidden Horror
trans-unit.target: 匿形惊惧兽

trans-unit.source: When Hidden Horror comes into play, choose and discard a creature card or bury Hidden Horror.
trans-unit.target: 当匿形惊惧兽进场时，选择弃掉一张生物牌，否则埋葬匿形惊惧兽。

trans-unit.source: Lifespans are measured by its dreadful length.
trans-unit.target: 牠以牠那恐怖的长度衡量著生命。

trans-unit.source: Infernal Tribute
trans-unit.target: 地狱的贡品

trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice a card in play: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲场上一张牌：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「我不愿拿我的灵魂来换取他们称为力量的污物，于是他们便将它夺走，并诅咒我孤独。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Mischievous Poltergeist
trans-unit.target: 顽皮捣蛋鬼

trans-unit.resname: WTH·74 | Mischievous Poltergeist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WTH·74 | Mischievous Poltergeist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life: Regenerate
trans-unit.target: 支付1点生命：重生

trans-unit.source: "The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't."\n—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「往日如同阴魂，从它存在到你消失都会不断纠缠著你。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Morinfen
trans-unit.target: 莫林芬

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep—1 life
trans-unit.target: 累积维持～1点生命

trans-unit.source: "I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「我望著牠的眼，发现牠的灵魂是如此空虚，以至于看不到任何反射的光芒。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Necratog
trans-unit.target: 死尸阿托格

trans-unit.source: Remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game: +2/+2 until end of turn
trans-unit.target: 将你坟墓场顶上起第一张生物牌移出游戏：+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The necratog can always dig up a meal.
trans-unit.target: 死尸阿托格总是能挖到一餐。

trans-unit.source: Odylic Wraith
trans-unit.target: 迷魂妖灵

trans-unit.resname: WTH·77 | Odylic Wraith | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者

trans-unit.resname: WTH·77 | Odylic Wraith | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If Odylic Wraith damages any player, that player chooses and discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 如果迷魂妖灵对任何玩家造成伤害，该玩家选择弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.
trans-unit.target: 你根本不会记得你看到牠。

trans-unit.source: Razortooth Rats
trans-unit.target: 利齿鼠

trans-unit.source: Razortooth Rats cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
trans-unit.target: 利齿鼠只能被神器生物或黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「人和鼠都会饿：我们吃我们的玩物，老鼠却吃我们。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Shadow Rider
trans-unit.target: 影子骑兵

trans-unit.source: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking is assigned to block this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 侧面攻击（若不具侧面攻击能力生物阻挡此生物，则阻挡生物得-1/-1直到回结束。）

trans-unit.source: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.
trans-unit.target: 在那一片漆黑的世界中，没有能令他害怕的阴影。

trans-unit.source: Shattered Crypt
trans-unit.target: 劈棺

trans-unit.source: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand and lose X life.
trans-unit.target: 从你的坟墓场中移回X张生物牌到手上并失去X点生命。

trans-unit.source: "You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the *Weatherlight*. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「要我这种人上晴空号，你们一定是疯了。不过要是我留下来和我腐朽的家人在一起，那就是我疯了。我接受你们的邀请。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Spinning Darkness
trans-unit.target: 暗之缧丝

trans-unit.source: You may remove the top three black cards in your graveyard from the game instead of paying Spinning Darkness's casting cost. Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. Gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将你的坟墓场顶上起三张黑色牌移出游戏，以代替暗之缧丝的施放费用。 暗之缧丝对目标非黑色生物造成3点伤害。你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WTH·82 | Strands of Night | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 夜之缕

trans-unit.resname: WTH·82 | Strands of Night | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「我看到夜晚转成为黑暗的丝带，纺织出比梦境更为阴冷的身影。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: "It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「正义和复仇的界线是很窄的。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: "May you be a stalker's dream."\n—Urborg curse
trans-unit.target: 「愿你为潜猎者之梦猎取。」 ～乌尔博格诅咒

trans-unit.resname: WTH·86 | Wave of Terror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sea of fear has endless depths.

trans-unit.target: 「在我的岸边拾起贝壳倾听吧。那并非是海的声音，而是逝者的耳语。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: "You can't get there from here. Well, you *can*—it just won't be fun."\n—Ertai, wizard adept

trans-unit.source:
Your father has no horns!

You drink the milk of goats!

trans-unit.target: 你老爸头上没角！ 你老妈脖子挂钟！ 你喝羊奶长大的！ ～塔路姆牛头怪挑衅

trans-unit.source: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.
trans-unit.target: 「你们将可用我敌人的骨头磨牙。」马拉克瑟斯如此答应他的食人魔，于是牠们便欢欣鼓舞了起来。

trans-unit.source: Thunderbolt

trans-unit.target: 「大部份的法师都把雷击视为适切的反击方式。」 ～著名的巫师尔泰

trans-unit.source: Its hooves strike lightning and the thunder follows quickly after.

trans-unit.target: 所有玩家不能使用任何需要支付启动费用的神器异能。

trans-unit.source: Gerrard: "But it doesn't *do* anything!"\nHanna: "No—it *does* nothing."
trans-unit.target: 杰拉尔德：「但它什么都没作啊！」 哈娜：「不～它作了『没作』。」

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Furnace
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚熔炉

trans-unit.source: oc T: Remove the bottom card of target player's graveyard from the game. o1, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Remove target card in any graveyard from the game and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: ocT：将目标玩家的坟墓场最底部的一张牌移出游戏。 o1，牺牲非瑞克西亚熔炉：将一张目标在任何坟墓场中的牌移出游戏，并且抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Serrated Biskelion
trans-unit.target: 双锯刺铁人

trans-unit.source: oc T: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: ocT：放置一个-1/-1指示物于双锯刺铁人上，并且放置一个-1/-1指示物于目标生物上。

trans-unit.source: "Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「我降生的目的是守护，双刺铁人降生的目的则是破坏。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Steel Golem
trans-unit.target: 钢铁魔像

trans-unit.source: You cannot play summon or artifact creature spells.
trans-unit.target: 你不可使用召唤或者神器生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Although I would give my life to protect Gerrard, my conscience will not let me take another's. There are many who would not hesitate."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「虽然我会为了保护杰拉尔德而付出自己的生命，但我的良心制止我去取别人的生命。许多人在面对这一点时是毫不犹豫的。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Straw Golem
trans-unit.target: 稻草魔像

trans-unit.source: If any opponent successfully casts a summon or artifact creature spell, bury Straw Golem.
trans-unit.target: 若任何对手成功施放召唤或者神器生物咒语，则埋葬稻草魔像。

trans-unit.source: "Don't look at me. *I* didn't build it."\n—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator
trans-unit.target: 「别看我。我可没造出它来。」 ～晴空号领航员哈娜

trans-unit.source: Thran Forge
trans-unit.target: 索蓝锻冶炉

trans-unit.source: o2: Until end of turn, target nonartifact creature gets +1/+0 and is an artifact creature.
trans-unit.target: o2：目标非神器的生物得+1/+0并且成为神器生物，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "This will work," Gerrard called to the elves as he used the forge to strengthen the aboroth, "but if it doesn't, we won't survive to care."
trans-unit.target: 「这就成了。」杰拉尔德用锻冶炉强化阿布洛斯后，对妖精们喊道，「就算这样不成，我们也没命活到去担心这回事的时候了。」

trans-unit.source: Thran Tome
trans-unit.target: 索蓝的巨作

trans-unit.source: o5, oc T: Reveal the top three cards of your library to target opponent. Bury one of those cards of that opponent's choice. Draw the remaining cards.
trans-unit.target: o5，ocT：将你的牌库顶上的三张牌交由对手检视。对手选择埋葬这些牌中的其中一张。你抽这些牌中剩下的牌。

trans-unit.source: Every line holds a tale, and between lie a thousand more.
trans-unit.target: 每条线上都盛载著一个故事，线与线之间则串过千万个。

trans-unit.source: Touchstone
trans-unit.target: 触石

trans-unit.source: oc T: Tap target artifact you do not control.
trans-unit.target: ocT：横置目标非你所操控的神器。

trans-unit.source: "One touch to the stone and the sidar's son turned me from stalwart to statue."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「在西达将军的儿子用这石头碰了我一下以后，我就成了一尊无力的雕像。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.resname: WTH·162 | Well of Knowledge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Well of Knowledge
trans-unit.target: 知识之井

trans-unit.resname: WTH·162 | Well of Knowledge | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Any player may pay o2 during his or her draw phase to draw a card. Players may use this ability as many times as they choose.
trans-unit.target: 任何玩家可以在他的抽牌阶段中，支付o2以抽一张牌。玩家可以使用此异能任意次数。

trans-unit.source: Xanthic Statue
trans-unit.target: 辛力雕像

trans-unit.source: o5: Until end of turn, Xanthic Statue is an 8/8 artifact creature with trample.
trans-unit.target: o5：辛力雕像是8/8且具践踏异能的神器生物，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Until you have lived as a statue, do not talk to me of pigeons."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「若你没当过雕像，就别和我谈鸽子的事。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Gemstone Mine
trans-unit.target: 宝石矿脉

trans-unit.source: When Gemstone Mine comes into play, put three mining counters on it. oc T, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, bury it.
trans-unit.target: 当宝石矿脉进场时，放置三个采矿指示物在其上。 ocT，由宝石矿脉上移走一个采矿指示物：加一点任意颜色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。若在宝石矿脉上没有任何采矿指示物，则将它埋葬。

trans-unit.source: Lotus Vale
trans-unit.target: 莲花谷

trans-unit.source: When Lotus Vale comes into play, sacrifice two untapped lands or bury Lotus Vale. oc T: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 当莲花谷进场时，牺牲两张未横置的地，否则埋葬莲花谷。 ocT：加三点任意一种颜色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: At what price beauty?
trans-unit.target: 美丽何价？

trans-unit.source: Scorched Ruins
trans-unit.target: 焦黑的遗迹

trans-unit.source: When Scorched Ruins comes into play, sacrifice two untapped lands or bury Scorched Ruins. oc T: Add four colorless mana to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 当焦黑的遗迹进场时，牺牲两张未横置的地，否则埋葬焦黑的遗迹。 ocT：加四点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: Winding Canyons
trans-unit.target: 蜿蜒的山谷

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. o2, oc T: Until end of turn, you may play creature cards whenever you could play instants.
trans-unit.target: ocT：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。 o2，ocT：你可以在能够使用瞬间的时机下使用生物牌，直到回合结束。
